titles.title: Motherhood Fairness Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for birth mothers whose children are adopted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/6/2010--Introduced. Motherhood Fairness Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a child tax credit to the birth mother of a child who is formally placed for adoption and to the taxpayer who adopts such child.
